ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class ViewPageActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.ViewPageActivity

  • public class ViewPageActivity
extends Activity
    The Activity in the application that is responsible for viewing and editing a page within a story.

    In this activity a reader can:
    1. Read the page
    2. Follow decisions at the bottom
    3. Comment on the page
    In this activity an author can:
    1. Edit the tiles on this page (add, edit, reorder, delete)
    The ViewPageActivity is a view of the application.
    Author:
    James Cadek, James Moore, Karl Parkins
